pkgmetadata.longdescription: MSigDB Gene Sets for Multiple Organisms in a Tidy Data Format // Provides the 'Molecular Signatures Database' (MSigDB) gene sets typically used with the 'Gene Set Enrichment Analysis' (GSEA) software (Subramanian et al. 2005 doi:10.1073/pnas.0506580102, Liberzon et al. 2015 doi:10.1016/j.cels.2015.12.004) in a standard R data frame with key-value pairs. The package includes the original human gene symbols and NCBI/Entrez IDs as well as the equivalents for frequently studied model organisms such as mouse, rat, pig, fly, and yeast.
